mapper.sql: CREATE TABLE DOCUMENT ( DOCUMENT_ID VARCHAR(64), CONTENT_TYPE VARCHAR(255), STATUS INT, TITLE TEXT, BODY TEXT, CREATE_DATE DATETIME, UPDATE_DATE DATETIME, OWNER_ID VARCHAR(64), ACL_ID VARCHAR(64), PRIMARY KEY (DOCUMENT_ID, STATUS) )

CREATE TABLE DOCUMENT_HISTORY ( DOCUMENT_ID VARCHAR(64), CONTENT_TYPE VARCHAR(255), VERSION VARCHAR(16), TITLE TEXT, BODY TEXT, CREATE_DATE DATETIME, UPDATE_DATE DATETIME, OWNER_ID VARCHAR(64), ACL_ID VARCHAR(64), PRIMARY KEY (DOCUMENT_ID, VERSION) )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM document ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document (DOCUMENT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, STATUS, TITLE, BODY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{documentId}, #{contentType}, 0, #{title}, #{body}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET TITLE=#{title}, BODY=#{body}, UPDATE_DATE=NOW() WHERE document_id=#{documentId} AND status=0
